1: וּבַשָּׁנָ֨ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> הַשְּׁבִעִ֜ית <sup>7637 </sup> <n>And in the seventh</n> הִתְחַזַּ֣ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>strengthened</n> יְהוֹיָדָ֗ע <sup>3077 </sup> <n>Jehoiada</n> וַיִּקַּ֣ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>himself and took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שָׂרֵ֣י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>the captains</n> הַמֵּא֡וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>of hundreds</n> לַעֲזַרְיָ֣הוּ <sup>5838 </sup> <n>Azariah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יְרֹחָ֡ם <sup>3395 </sup> <n>of Jeroham</n> וּלְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>and Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יְ֠הוֹחָנָן <sup>3076 </sup> <n>of Jehohanan</n> וְלַֽעֲזַרְיָ֨הוּ <sup>5838 </sup> <n>and Azariah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> עוֹבֵ֜ד <sup>5744 </sup> <n>of Obed</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַעֲשֵׂיָ֧הוּ <sup>4641 </sup> <n>and Maaseiah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> עֲדָיָ֛הוּ <sup>5718 </sup> <n>of Adaiah</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱלִישָׁפָ֥ט <sup>478 </sup> <n>and Elishaphat</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> זִכְרִ֖י <sup>2147 </sup> <n>of Zichri</n> עִמּ֥וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>into</n> בַבְּרִֽית׃ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>into covenant</n>
2: וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>And they went about</n> בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>in Judah</n> וַיִּקְבְּצ֤וּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>and gathered</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַלְוִיִּם֙ <sup>3881 </sup> <n>the Levites</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>out of all the cities</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וְרָאשֵׁ֥י <sup>7218 </sup> <n>and the chief</n> הָאָב֖וֹת <sup>1 </sup> <n>of the fathers</n> לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and they came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>to Jerusalem</n>
3: וַיִּכְרֹ֨ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>made</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַקָּהָ֥ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>And all the congregation</n> בְּרִ֛ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>a covenant</n> בְּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>in the house</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>with the king</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> לָהֶ֗ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>to them</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto them Behold the king's</n> יִמְלֹ֔ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>shall reign</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> דִּבֶּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>hath said</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the sons</n> דָוִֽיד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n>
4: זֶ֥ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>This</n> הַדָּבָ֖ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>This [is] the thing</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that ye shall do</n> הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֨ית <sup>7992 </sup> <n>A third part</n> מִכֶּ֜ם <sup>4480 </sup> <n>who</n> בָּאֵ֣י <sup>935 </sup> <n>of you entering</n> הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <sup>7676 </sup> <n>on the sabbath</n> לַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>of the priests</n> וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>and of the Levites</n> לְשֹֽׁעֲרֵ֖י <sup>7778 </sup> <n>[shall be] porters</n> הַסִּפִּֽים׃ <sup>5592 </sup> <n>of the doors</n>
5: וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <sup>7992 </sup> <n>And a third part</n> בְּבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>[shall be] at the king's</n> וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <sup>7992 </sup> <n>and a third part</n> בְּשַׁ֣עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>at the gate</n> הַיְס֑וֹד <sup>3247 </sup> <n>of the foundation</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> בְּחַצְר֖וֹת <sup>2691 </sup> <n>[shall be] in the courts</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
6: וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>no</n> יָב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>But let none come</n> בֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>save the priests</n> וְהַמְשָׁרְתִ֣ים <sup>8334 </sup> <n>and they that minister</n> לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>of the Levites</n> הֵ֥מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> יָבֹ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>they shall go in</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קֹ֣דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>for they [are] holy</n> הֵ֑מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and let</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>but all the people</n> יִשְׁמְר֖וּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>shall keep</n> מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <sup>4931 </sup> <n>the watch</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
7: וְהִקִּיפוּ֩ <sup>5362 </sup> <n>shall compass</n> הַלְוִיִּ֨ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>And the Levites</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> סָבִ֗יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> אִ֚ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> וְכֵלָ֣יו <sup>3627 </sup> <n>with his weapons</n> בְּיָד֔וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in his hand</n> וְהַבָּ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and whosoever [else] cometh</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַבַּ֖יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> יוּמָ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall be put to death</n> וִֽהְי֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>Thus be with</n> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>but be ye with the king</n> בְּבֹא֥וֹ <sup>935 </sup> <n>when he cometh in</n> וּבְצֵאתֽוֹ׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and when he goeth out</n>
8: וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <sup>3881 </sup> <n>So the Levites</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> יְהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>and all Judah</n> כְּכֹ֣ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צִוָּה֮ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>had commanded</n> יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <sup>3077 </sup> <n>according to all things that Jehoiada</n> הַכֹּהֵן֒ <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priest</n> וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and took</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <sup>376 </sup> <n>one</n> בָּאֵ֣י <sup>935 </sup> <n>that were to come in</n> הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <sup>7676 </sup> <n>on the sabbath</n> עִ֖ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>were to</n> יוֹצְאֵ֣י <sup>3318 </sup> <n>with them that were to go</n> הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <sup>7676 </sup> <n>[out] on the sabbath</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> פָטַ֛ר <sup>6362 </sup> <n>dismiss</n> יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <sup>3077 </sup> <n>for Jehoiada</n> הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priest</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַֽמַּחְלְקֽוֹת׃ <sup>4256 </sup> <n>not the courses</n>
9: וַיִּתֵּן֩ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>delivered</n> יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <sup>3077 </sup> <n>Moreover Jehoiada</n> הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priest</n> לְשָׂרֵ֣י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>to the captains</n> הַמֵּא֗וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>of hundreds</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַֽחֲנִיתִים֙ <sup>2595 </sup> <n>spears</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמָּגִנּוֹת֙ <sup>4043 </sup> <n>and bucklers</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשְּׁלָטִ֔ים <sup>7982 </sup> <n>and shields</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>that [had been] king</n> דָּוִ֑יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>David's</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>which [were] in the house</n> הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n>
10: וַיַּעֲמֵ֨ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>And he set</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֜ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>all the people</n> וְאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> שִׁלְח֣וֹ <sup>7973 </sup> <n>having his weapon</n> בְיָד֗וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in his hand</n> מִכֶּ֨תֶף <sup>3802 </sup> <n>side</n> הַבַּ֤יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the temple</n> הַיְמָנִית֙ <sup>3233 </sup> <n>from the right</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> כֶּ֤תֶף <sup>3802 </sup> <n>side</n> הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the temple</n> הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔ית <sup>8042 </sup> <n>to the left</n> לַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>along by the altar</n> וְלַבָּ֑יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and the temple</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>by the king</n> סָבִֽיב׃ <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n>
11: וַיּוֹצִ֣יאוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Then they brought out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king's</n> וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and put</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנֵּ֙זֶר֙ <sup>5145 </sup> <n>upon him the crown</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָ֣עֵד֔וּת <sup>5715 </sup> <n>and [gave him] the testimony</n> וַיַּמְלִ֖יכוּ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>and made him king</n> אֹת֑וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וַיִּמְשָׁחֻ֙הוּ֙ <sup>4886 </sup> <n>anointed</n> יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <sup>3077 </sup> <n>And Jehoiada</n> וּבָנָ֔יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and his sons</n> וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>him and said</n> יְחִ֥י <sup>2421 </sup> <n>God save</n> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> ס
12: וַתִּשְׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> עֲתַלְיָ֗הוּ <sup>6271 </sup> <n>Now when Athaliah</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> ק֤וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>the noise</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> הָֽרָצִ֔ים <sup>7323 </sup> <n>running</n> וְהַֽמְהַֽלְלִ֖ים <sup>1984 </sup> <n>and praising</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> וַתָּב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>she came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>to the people</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
